OF THE SUB

You are my husband. In consideration of the love I have for you and in return for that love, I hereby relinquish all rights I have ever had in the property in this Schedule and without any consideration from you, and I hereby transfer all rights I have in the said Schedule property to you and vest all vested rights in the said property in you and I hereby take possession of the said Schedule property in the presence of the following intermediaries this day. Therefore, you shall take possession of the said property and enjoy it freely and freely with all the full rights and privileges of donation and sale as you wish. I hereby undertake to remove all the obstacles and obstacles arising from this matter at my own expense and to execute this deed without any hindrance. I hereby declare that I have not committed any act in violation of this deed, mortgage or any other encroachment on the property and that it is an undisputed property and that the survey number, boundaries and permit are correct. I hereby issue this deed in your name. The Scheduled Property is not a property assigned by the A.P. Government vide Act No. 9/77.
A notice has been filed with the Gram Panchayat for the registration of the said property in your name. The property as per the Scheduled Property below was inherited by me from my ancestors i.e. my parents and since then till date I have been enjoying full possession and rights.
Kadali Anjammatras Sheet Endorsement

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 305 of 2026, dated 30/Jan/2026, executed by Kadali Anjamma in favour of her Husband, Kadali Srinu towards the property admeasuring an extent of 103.33 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 3-59, comprised in survey number 104/8, situated in Kothalaparru Village & Gram Panchayat, Penugonda Mandal, within the District of West Godavari, registered at sub-registrar office Penugonda, is bounded as follows: North by: Road, 30.0 Sq. Ft South by: Site of Kadali Lakshmi, 30.0 Sq. Ft East by: House of Guttula Lakshmi, 31.0 Sq. Ft West by: Site of Chintapalli Kanaka Durga, 31.0 Sq. Ft
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
